name: Space Survival (itch) (Reflection Favorite Games)
description:
This is an old school arcade game. Your task is to score as many points as possible in three game modes.

1. Classic game mode. Fight asteroids, UFOs, homing missiles and bosses.

2. UFO survival. In this mode, you have to fight flying saucers and bosses with a powerful three-barreled cannon.

3. Checkpoint. you can't shoot. You need to maneuver among small asteroids, collecting as many control points as possible.

The physics of the game simulates the real behavior of the ship in outer space. From time to time, you will encounter UFOs with strange behavior, which, when destroyed, leave a bonus that gives an extra life. If you are ready to survive in an unforgiving space, then try your chances in the game "Space Survival".
